title: Luodemiss Women's Denim Distressed Shorts Frayed Mid-Rise Denim Shorts for Women Casual Jeans Shorts
features: Luodemiss women denim shorts fit runs straight, true to the raw-frayed hem. Light distressing and weathered fringe detail at the body.
This denim shorts was designed with mid-rise to create a low-slung, slouchy fit that hangs from the hips for an easy, casual look.
Classic five-pocket jean shorts has a traditional mid-waist with button fly closure and belt loop waistband. Feeling conveninent with the side slit detailing.
Get with your favourite top and make the weekend count in these Luodemiss Distressed Denim Shorts. Material: 75% Cotton,22% Polyester,3% Spendax. Carement: Machine wash and tumble dry.

Denim Shorts Size: Small(Fits US 4-6):Waist:26"-27"./ Medium(Fits US 8-10):Waist:28"-30"./ Large(Fits US 10-12):Waist:30"-32". / X-Large(Fits US 12-14):Waist:32"-33"./ XX-Large(Fits US 16-18):Waist:33"-34".
